industry.name: Ankita Kumari
industry.content: HackBio gave me the boldness to work across borders and time zone. I quickly translated that to my job search and it worked the magic.

industry.name: Mike Femi
industry.content: The genomics track of the internship was a dealmaker for me. I have secured a research jobs at 2 startups even before starting my PhD.

academia.name: Winfred Gatua
academia.content: My HackBio experience (and preprint) was my leverage for an interesting conversation with my interview with my Graduate School Admission Team.

academia.name: Toluwalase Adeosun
academia.content: Being a chemist, HackBio provided the biology and technical competence for me to dive into drug development. My initially doubtful supervisor quickly approved me before the end of the admission meeting.

academia.name: Siddhant Sharma
academia.content: Since I completed the HackBio internship, I have won more than 3 remote grants as an undergraduate in Sweden & USA. The experience has being wonderful for me.

academia.name: Ayo Adeniyi
academia.content: The internship gave me deep understandings and competencies of the questions modern research is trying to answer and it was impressive to my Admission team.
